type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Cancel Order Unexpected Error

definition.text: An Uncexpected Error occured while trying to cancel an order at the exchange. The LF Trading Bot continued running after reporting this error.

paragraphs.text: Cancelling an order means sending a request to the exchange via it's API to cancel the order. There are many different reasons why this can fail. Some of those reasons are under your control, and some are not. Some might be temporaly unavailability of the exchange servers, communication, network, or other issues. Below you can find the error details which will help you understand the nature of the problem. The LF Trading Bot expects that some issue may happens and has logic to handle these problems and continue operating.
In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
